moves.6. c3 cxd4 7. Nxd4 Nc6 8. O-O Bc5 9. e5: 2 good bishop for white versus a possible castle...but 2 good bishop for black versus a castle done. i think a beginner's wrong:

it's a strange move for a good player...in general computers make this kind of wrong
